$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/2story.title: $:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/2story
$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/2story.caption: {{$:/xp/images/2column}} 2story
$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/2story.text: \whitespace trim <$reveal state="$:/config/_sq/Stories/story2" type="nomatch" text="no" default="no"> <$button set="$:/config/_sq/Stories/story2" setTo="no" tooltip="Hide right column" aria-label="" class="tc-btn-invisible quickbar-active-indicator" style="padding:7px;border-radius:unset;"> {{$:/xp/images/1column}} <$reveal state="$:/config/_sq/Stories/story2" type="match" text="no" default="no"> <$button set="$:/config/_sq/Stories/story2" setTo="yes" tooltip="Show right column" aria-label="" class="tc-btn-invisible quickbar-active-indicator" style="padding:7px;border-radius:unset;"> {{$:/xp/images/2column}}

$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/aggregation.title: $:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/aggregation
$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/aggregation.caption: {{$:/xp/images/aggregation}} content aggregation
$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/aggregation.text:
\whitespace trim \define aggregationButton(title) <$button to="$title$" tooltip={{$title$!!description}} class="tc-btn-invisible" style="margin-top:3px;"> <$transclude tiddler="$title$" field="caption"> <$view tiddler="$title$" field="title"/>
\end
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="padding:7px;"> {{$:/xp/images/aggregation}}
<> <> <> <> <> <> <> <> <> <>

$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/big-font.title: $:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/big-font
$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/big-font.caption: {{$:/xp/quickbar/images/plus}} big font
$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/big-font.text:
\whitespace trim
<$wikify name="fontUp" text="""
<$list filter="[{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/bodyfontsize}previous[$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/big-font]]" emptyMessage="40px"/>
""">
<$wikify name="fontDown" text="""
<$list filter="[{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/bodyfontsize}next[$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/big-font]]" emptyMessage="13px"/>
""">
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Decrease font size">
	<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/bodyfontsize" text=<<fontDown>>/>
	<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/bodylineheight" text="1.466666667"/>
	<$reveal default="yes" type="match" text={{{[{$:/_sq/Stories/Story2StoryList!!list}length[]match[0]then[no]] ~[{$:/config/_sq/Stories/story2}]}}}>
	<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/config/sq/Stories/story2/fontsize-body" text=<<fontDown>>/>
	</$reveal>
{{$:/xp/quickbar/images/minus}}
</$button>
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="padding:7px 0;" tooltip="Restore Defaults">
	<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/bodyfontsize" text="15px"/>
	<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/bodylineheight" text="22px"/>
	<$reveal default="yes" type="match" text={{{[{$:/_sq/Stories/Story2StoryList!!list}length[]match[0]then[no]] ~[{$:/config/_sq/Stories/story2}]}}}>
	<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/config/sq/Stories/story2/fontsize-body" text="15px"/>
	</$reveal>
<small><$view tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/bodyfontsize" field="text"/></small>
</$button>
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Increase font size">
	<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/bodyfontsize" text=<<fontUp>>/>
	<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/bodylineheight" text="1.466666667"/>
	<$reveal default="yes" type="match" text={{{[{$:/_sq/Stories/Story2StoryList!!list}length[]match[0]then[no]] ~[{$:/config/_sq/Stories/story2}]}}}>
	<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/config/sq/Stories/story2/fontsize-body" text=<<fontUp>>/>
	</$reveal>
{{$:/xp/quickbar/images/plus}}
</$button>
</$wikify>
</$wikify>

$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/create.title: $:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/create
$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/create.caption: {{$:/xp/quickbar/images/add}} create
$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/create.text:
\whitespace trim
<$button to="$:/xp/quickbar/create" tooltip="Create a new button" class="tc-btn-invisible">
{{$:/xp/quickbar/images/add}}
</$button>

$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/hide.title: $:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/hide
$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/hide.caption: {{$:/xp/quickbar/images/hide}} hide
$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/hide.text:
<$button tooltip="Hide quickbar" class="tc-btn-invisible">
<$list filter="[[$:/xp/quickbar/main]get[tags]match[$:/tags/PageTemplate]]" variable="ignore">
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/xp/quickbar/main" tags=""/>
</$list>
<$list filter="[{$:/xp/quickbar/main!!tags}is[blank]]" variable="ignore">
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/xp/quickbar/main" tags="$:/tags/PageTemplate"/>
</$list>
{{$:/xp/quickbar/images/hide}}
</$button>

$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/leftopentab.title: $:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/leftopentab
$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/leftopentab.caption: {{$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/button!!caption}}
$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/leftopentab.text:
\whitespace trim
\import $:/xp/LeftOpenTab/macros

<$list filter="[[$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/judge]!is[tiddler]]" variable="ignore">
<$button set="$:/state/leftopentab" setTo="show" tooltip="Left open tab" aria-label="Left open tab" class="tc-btn-invisible">
{{$:/xp/images/leftopentab}}
	<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/compatible-with-Stories-plugin.css" tags="$:/tags/Stylesheet"/>
	<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/core/ui/SideBar/Open" tags=""/>
	<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/tab/sidebar--595412856" text="TableOfContents"/>
	<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/judge" text="pass"/>
	<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storyleft" text=<<storyleftValue>>/>
	<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storyright" text=<<storyrightValue>>/>
</$button>
</$list>

<$list filter="[[$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/judge]is[tiddler]]" variable="ignore">
<$button set="$:/state/leftopentab" setTo="hide" tooltip="Restore open tab" aria-label="Restore open tab" class="tc-btn-invisible">
{{$:/xp/images/restoreopentab}}
	<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/compatible-with-Stories-plugin.css" tags=""/>
	<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/core/ui/SideBar/Open" tags="$:/tags/SideBar"/>
	<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/tab/sidebar--595412856" text="$:/core/ui/SideBar/Open"/>
	<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storyleft" text=<<storyleftdefault>>/>
	<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storyright" text=<<storyrightdefault>>/>
	<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/judge"/>
</$button>
</$list>

$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/manage-tags.title: $:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/manage-tags
$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/manage-tags.caption: {{$:/xp/manageTags/button!!caption}}
$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/manage-tags.text:
\whitespace trim
<$fieldmangler tiddler="$:/xp/manageTags/tagging">
<$list filter="[[$:/xp/manageTags/tagging]!tag[$:/tags/ViewTemplate]]">
<$button message="tm-add-tag" param="$:/tags/ViewTemplate" tooltip="Manage tags in view mode" class=<<tv-config-toolbar-class>>>
{{$:/xp/manageTags/images/tag}}
</$button>
</$list>

<$list filter="[[$:/xp/manageTags/tagging]tag[$:/tags/ViewTemplate]]">
<$button message="tm-remove-tag" param="$:/tags/ViewTemplate" tooltip="Hide manage tags in view mode" class="tc-btn-invisible quickbar-active-indicator" style="padding-bottom:8px;">
{{$:/xp/manageTags/images/tag}}
</$button>
</$list>
</$fieldmangler>

$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/maximize-river.title: $:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/maximize-river
$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/maximize-river.caption: {{$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/Buttons/maximize-river!!caption}}
$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/maximize-river.text:
\whitespace trim
\import $:/xp/LeftOpenTab/macros

<$reveal state="$:/state/maximize-river" type="match" text="no" default="no">
<$button tooltip="Maximize the story river" aria-label="maximize river" class="tc-btn-invisible" style="padding:7px;">
{{$:/xp/images/maximize}}

	<$list filter="[[$:/state/sidebar]get[text]] +[else[yes]!match[no]]" variable="ignore">
		<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/sidebar" text="no"/>
	</$list>

		<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/leftopentab" text="no"/>
		<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/compatible-with-Stories-plugin.css" tags=""/>
		<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/core/ui/SideBar/Open" tags="$:/tags/SideBar"/>
		<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/tab/sidebar--595412856" text="$:/core/ui/SideBar/Open"/>
		<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storyleft" text=<<storyleftdefault>>/>
		<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storyright" text=<<storyrightdefault>>/>
		<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/judge"/>
		<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/leftopentab/executed" text="yes"/>

	<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/maximize-river" $value="yes"/>

</$button>
</$reveal>

<$reveal state="$:/state/maximize-river" type="match" text="yes">
<$button tooltip="Un-maximize" aria-label="unmaximize river" class="tc-btn-invisible quickbar-active-indicator" style="padding:7px;border-radius:unset;">
{{$:/xp/images/unmaximize}}

	<$list filter="[[$:/state/sidebar]get[text]] +[else[yes]match[no]]" variable="ignore">
		<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/sidebar" text="yes"/>
	</$list>

	<$reveal state="$:/state/leftopentab/executed" type="match" text="yes" default="no">
		<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/leftopentab" text="yes"/>
		<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/compatible-with-Stories-plugin.css" tags="$:/tags/Stylesheet"/>
		<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/core/ui/SideBar/Open" tags=""/>
		<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/tab/sidebar--595412856" text="TableOfContents"/>
		<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/xp/LeftOpenTab/judge" text="pass"/>
		<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storyleft" text=<<storyleftValue>>/>
		<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storyright" text=<<storyrightValue>>/>
		<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/leftopentab/executed" text="no"/>
	</$reveal>

	<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/maximize-river" $value="no"/>

</$button>
</$reveal>

$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/task.title: $:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/task
$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/task.caption: {{$:/xp/images/task}} task management
$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/task.text:
\whitespace trim \define taskpanel()
Ongoing
<>
Completed
<$list filter="[tag[task]tag[done]!has[draft.of]!sort[created]limit[5]]">
<$checkbox tag="done"> ~~<$link/>~~
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/tab/sidebar--595412856" text="$:/xp/ui/SideBar/TaskManagement"/> Click me to see more completed tasks in the sidebar <$button tooltip="New task" actions={{$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-task}}> {{$:/core/images/new-button}} <$button to="Task Monitor" tooltip="Monitor"> {{$:/xp/images/tasks}} \end
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> {{$:/xp/images/task}}
<>

$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/theme-changer.title: $:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/theme-changer
$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/theme-changer.caption: {{$:/xp/theme-changer/button!!caption}}
$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/theme-changer.text:
\whitespace trim \define themechangerButton() <$list filter="[[$:/palettes/SolarFlare]] [all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/Palette]tag[XP]!sort[]] [[$:/palettes/Vanilla]]"> <$button set="$:/palette" setTo={{!!title}} class="tc-btn-invisible xp-quickbar-theme-changer"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/xp/theme-changer/nightBoxes.css" tags=""/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/xp/theme-changer/styles/DarkGreen" tags=""/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/xp/theme-changer/greenBoxes.css" tags=""/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/xp/theme-changer/styles/EyeCareGreen" tags=""/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/xp/theme-changer/styles/EyeCareGreen2" tags=""/> <$action-setfield $tiddler={{!!css}} tags="$:/tags/Stylesheet"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler={{!!css-boxes}} tags="$:/tags/Stylesheet"/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <$transclude field="name"/> <$list filter="[{$:/palette}match{!!title}]">  ✓
\end
<$button tooltip="Switch custom themes" aria-label="theme changer" class="tc-btn-invisible"> {{$:/xp/theme-changer/images/theme}}
<>

$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/top.title: $:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/top
$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/top.caption: {{$:/xp/images/top}} top of story river
$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/top.text:
\whitespace trim
<$button tooltip="Top of story river" aria-label="Top of story river" class="tc-btn-invisible" style="outline:none;">
{{$:/xp/images/top}}
<$list variable='Target' filter='[list[$:/StoryList]first[]]'>
<$action-navigate $to=<<Target>>/>
</$list>
</$button>

$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/view-fields.title: $:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/view-fields
$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/view-fields.caption: {{$:/plugins/kookma/utility/ui/Buttons/ViewFields!!caption}}
$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/view-fields.text:
\whitespace trim
\define stateTid() $:/state/utility/view-fields
\define disp-on-pagecontrols() {{$:/plugins/kookma/utility/images/view-fields.svg}}

<$reveal type="nomatch" state=<<stateTid>> text="show" default="hide">
  <$button set=<<stateTid>> setTo="show" 
	         tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Utility/Hint}} 
					 aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Utility/Caption}} 
					 class=<<tv-config-toolbar-class>> style="padding:7px;">
    <<disp-on-pagecontrols>>
  </$button>
</$reveal>

<$reveal type="match" state=<<stateTid>> text="show" default="hide">
  <$button set=<<stateTid>> setTo="hide" 
           tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Utility/Hint}} 
				   aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Utility/Caption}} 
				   class="tc-btn-invisible quickbar-active-indicator" style="padding:7px;border-radius:unset;">
     <<disp-on-pagecontrols>>
  </$button>
</$reveal>

$:/xp/quickbar/button.title: $:/xp/quickbar/button
$:/xp/quickbar/button.caption: {{$:/xp/quickbar/images/icon}} quickbar
$:/xp/quickbar/button.text: \whitespace trim <$list filter="[[$:/xp/quickbar/main]get[tags]match[$:/tags/PageTemplate]]" variable="ignore"> <$button tooltip="Hide quickbar" aria-label="hide quickbar" class=<>> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/xp/quickbar/images/icon}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text="hide quickbar"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/xp/quickbar/main" tags=""/> <$list filter="[{$:/xp/quickbar/main!!tags}is[blank]]" variable="ignore"> <$button tooltip="Show quickbar" aria-label="show quickbar" class=<>> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/xp/quickbar/images/icon}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text="show quickbar"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/xp/quickbar/main" tags="$:/tags/PageTemplate"/>

$:/xp/quickbar/create/Actions/convert-na.title: $:/xp/quickbar/create/Actions/convert-navigation-button
$:/xp/quickbar/create/Actions/convert-na.text:
\define get-tags() $(textFieldTags)$ $(tagsFieldTags)$
<$vars fastconversionFromTitleTemplate={{$:/config/convert-navigation-button/From}} fastconversionToTitleTemplate={{$:/config/convert-navigation-button/To}} textFieldTags={{$:/config/new-navigation-button/Tags}} tagsFieldTags={{$:/config/new-navigation-button/Tags!!tags}}>
<$wikify name="fastconversionFromTitle" text="""<$macrocall $name="now" format=<<fastconversionFromTitleTemplate>>/>""">
<$wikify name="fastconversionToTitle" text="""<$macrocall $name="now" format=<<fastconversionToTitleTemplate>>/>""">
<$action-createtiddler $overwrite="yes" $basetitle=<<fastconversionToTitle>> tags=<<get-tags>> text={{{ [<fastconversionFromTitle>addprefix[{{]addsuffix[}}]] }}} caption={{{ [<fastconversionFromTitle>addprefix[{{]addsuffix[!!caption}}]] }}} description={{{ [<fastconversionFromTitle>addprefix[{{]addsuffix[!!description}}]] }}}/>
</$wikify>
</$wikify>
</$vars>

$:/xp/quickbar/create/Actions/convert-pa.title: $:/xp/quickbar/create/Actions/convert-pagecontrol-tool
$:/xp/quickbar/create/Actions/convert-pa.text:
\define get-tags() $(textFieldTags)$ $(tagsFieldTags)$
<$vars fastconversionFromTitleTemplate={{$:/config/convert-pagecontrol-tool/From}} fastconversionToTitleTemplate={{$:/config/convert-pagecontrol-tool/To}} textFieldTags={{$:/config/new-pagecontrol-tool/Tags}} tagsFieldTags={{$:/config/new-pagecontrol-tool/Tags!!tags}}>
<$wikify name="fastconversionFromTitle" text="""<$macrocall $name="now" format=<<fastconversionFromTitleTemplate>>/>""">
<$wikify name="fastconversionToTitle" text="""<$macrocall $name="now" format=<<fastconversionToTitleTemplate>>/>""">
<$action-createtiddler $overwrite="yes" $basetitle=<<fastconversionToTitle>> tags=<<get-tags>> text={{{ [<fastconversionFromTitle>addprefix[{{]addsuffix[}}]] }}} caption={{{ [<fastconversionFromTitle>addprefix[{{]addsuffix[!!caption}}]] }}} description={{{ [<fastconversionFromTitle>addprefix[{{]addsuffix[!!description}}]] }}}/>
</$wikify>
</$wikify>
</$vars>

$:/xp/quickbar/create/Actions/new-naviga.title: $:/xp/quickbar/create/Actions/new-navigation-button
$:/xp/quickbar/create/Actions/new-naviga.text:
\define get-tags() $(textFieldTags)$ $(tagsFieldTags)$
<$vars newnavigationTitleTemplate={{$:/config/new-navigation-button/Title}} textFieldTags={{$:/config/new-navigation-button/Tags}} tagsFieldTags={{$:/config/new-navigation-button/Tags!!tags}} newnavigationText={{$:/config/new-navigation-button/Text}} newnavigationCaption={{$:/config/new-navigation-button/Caption}} newnavigationDescription={{$:/config/new-navigation-button/Description}}>
<$wikify name="newnavigationTitle" text="""<$macrocall $name="now" format=<<newnavigationTitleTemplate>>/>""">
<$reveal type="nomatch" state=<<newnavigationTitle>> text="">
<$action-createtiddler $overwrite="yes" $basetitle=<<newnavigationTitle>> tags=<<get-tags>> text={{{ [<newnavigationTitle>get[]] }}} caption=<<newnavigationCaption>> description=<<newnavigationDescription>>"/>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type="match" state=<<newnavigationTitle>> text="">
<$action-createtiddler $overwrite="yes" $basetitle=<<newnavigationTitle>> tags=<<get-tags>> text=<<newnavigationText>> caption=<<newnavigationCaption>> description=<<newnavigationDescription>>/>
</$reveal>
</$wikify>
</$vars>

$:/xp/quickbar/create/Actions/new-pageco.title: $:/xp/quickbar/create/Actions/new-pagecontrol-tool
$:/xp/quickbar/create/Actions/new-pageco.text:
\define get-tags() $(textFieldTags)$ $(tagsFieldTags)$
<$vars newpagecontroltoolTitleTemplate={{$:/config/new-pagecontrol-tool/Title}} textFieldTags={{$:/config/new-pagecontrol-tool/Tags}} tagsFieldTags={{$:/config/new-pagecontrol-tool/Tags!!tags}} newpagecontroltoolText={{$:/config/new-pagecontrol-tool/Text}} newpagecontroltoolCaption={{$:/config/new-pagecontrol-tool/Caption}} newpagecontroltoolDescription={{$:/config/new-pagecontrol-tool/Description}}>
<$wikify name="newpagecontroltoolTitle" text="""<$macrocall $name="now" format=<<newpagecontroltoolTitleTemplate>>/>""">
<$reveal type="nomatch" state=<<newpagecontroltoolTitle>> text="">
<$action-createtiddler $overwrite="yes" $basetitle=<<newpagecontroltoolTitle>> tags=<<get-tags>> text={{{ [<newpagecontroltoolTitle>get[]] }}} caption=<<newpagecontroltoolCaption>> description=<<newpagecontroltoolDescription>>"/>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type="match" state=<<newpagecontroltoolTitle>> text="">
<$action-createtiddler $overwrite="yes" $basetitle=<<newpagecontroltoolTitle>> tags=<<get-tags>> text=<<newpagecontroltoolText>> caption=<<newpagecontroltoolCaption>> description=<<newpagecontroltoolDescription>>/>
</$reveal>
</$wikify>
</$vars>

$:/xp/quickbar/create/Buttons/convert-na.title: $:/xp/quickbar/create/Buttons/convert-navigation-button
$:/xp/quickbar/create/Buttons/convert-na.caption: {{$:/core/images/right-arrow}} convert navigation button

<$button actions={{$:/xp/quickbar/create/Actions/convert-navigation-button}} tooltip="Create a navigation button" aria-label="new navigation button">
<$action-navigate $to={{$:/config/convert-navigation-button/To}}/>
Convert
</$button>

<$action-navigate $to={{$:/config/convert-pagecontrol-tool/To}}/>
Convert
</$button>

$:/xp/quickbar/create/Buttons/new-naviga.title: $:/xp/quickbar/create/Buttons/new-navigation-button

\whitespace trim
<$button actions={{$:/xp/quickbar/create/Actions/new-navigation-button}} tooltip="Create a navigation button" aria-label="new navigation button">
<$action-navigate $to={{$:/config/new-navigation-button/Title}}/>
Create
</$button>

$:/xp/quickbar/create/Buttons/new-pageco.title: $:/xp/quickbar/create/Buttons/new-pagecontrol-tool
$:/xp/quickbar/create/Buttons/new-pageco.caption: {{$:/core/images/new-button}} new pagecontrol tool

Create

quickbar-new-navigation-button.title: quickbar-new-navigation-button
quickbar-new-navigation-button.caption: A navigation button
quickbar-new-navigation-button.text: \define et-quickbar-navigation(size) |<$link to="$:/config/new-navigation-button/Title">Title |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/new-navigation-button/Title" default="" tag="input" size=$size$/> | |<$link to="$:/config/new-navigation-button/Caption">Caption |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/new-navigation-button/Caption" default="" tag="input" size=$size$/> | |<$link to="$:/config/new-navigation-button/Caption">Description |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/new-navigation-button/Description" default="" tag="input" size=$size$/> | |<$link to="$:/config/new-navigation-button/Text">Text |<$edit tiddler="$:/config/new-navigation-button/Text" tag="textarea" class="tc-edit-texteditor" default=""/> | |>| {{$:/xp/quickbar/create/Buttons/new-navigation-button}} | \end \define et-quickbar-conversion(size) |<$link to="$:/config/convert-navigation-button/From">From |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/convert-navigation-button/From" default="" tag="input" size="$size$"/> | |<$link to="$:/config/convert-navigation-button/To">To |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/convert-navigation-button/To" default="" tag="input" size="$size$"/> | |>| {{$:/xp/quickbar/create/Buttons/convert-navigation-button}} | \end <> <> Fast conversion: <> <>

quickbar-new-pagecontrol-tool.title: quickbar-new-pagecontrol-tool
quickbar-new-pagecontrol-tool.caption: A page control tool
quickbar-new-pagecontrol-tool.text: \define et-quickbar-pagecontrol(size) |<$link to="$:/config/new-pagecontrol-tool/Title">Title |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/new-pagecontrol-tool/Title" default="" tag="input" size="$size$"/> | |<$link to="$:/config/new-pagecontrol-tool/Caption">Caption |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/new-pagecontrol-tool/Caption" default="" tag="input" size="$size$"/> | |<$link to="$:/config/new-pagecontrol-tool/Caption">Description |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/new-pagecontrol-tool/Description" default="" tag="input" size="$size$"/> | |<$link to="$:/config/new-pagecontrol-tool/Text">Text |<$edit tiddler="$:/config/new-pagecontrol-tool/Text" tag="textarea" class="tc-edit-texteditor" default=""/> | |>| {{$:/xp/quickbar/create/Buttons/new-pagecontrol-tool}} | \end \define et-quickbar-conversion(size) |<$link to="$:/config/convert-pagecontrol-tool/From">From |<> | |<$link to="$:/config/convert-pagecontrol-tool/To">To |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/convert-pagecontrol-tool/To" default="" tag="input" size="$size$"/> | |>| {{$:/xp/quickbar/create/Buttons/convert-pagecontrol-tool}} | \end \define select-pagecontrols() <$select tiddler="$:/config/convert-pagecontrol-tool/From" default='$:/core/ui/Buttons/home'> <$list filter='[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/PageControls]sort[title]]'> \end <> <> Fast conversion: <> <>

$:/xp/quickbar/create.title: $:/xp/quickbar/create
$:/xp/quickbar/create.text:
<$tiddler tiddler="$:/xp/quickbar/create/text">
<$radio field="text" value="""{{quickbar-new-pagecontrol-tool}}""" > PAGE CONTROL TOOL </$radio> 
<$radio field="text" value="""{{quickbar-new-navigation-button}}""" > NAVIGATION BUTTON </$radio>
</$tiddler>

{{$:/xp/quickbar/create/text}}

$:/xp/quickbar/items/aggregation.title: $:/xp/quickbar/items/aggregation
$:/xp/quickbar/items/aggregation.caption: Aggregation
$:/xp/quickbar/items/aggregation.text:
\define aggregationButton(title) <$button to="$title$" tooltip={{$title$!!description}} class="tc-btn-invisible" style="margin-top:3px;"> <$transclude tiddler="$title$" field="caption"> <$view tiddler="$title$" field="title"/> \end
<> <> <> <> <> <> <> <> <> <>

\end
<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/QuickBar/HoverPopupButtons]!has[draft.of]]" variable="listItem">
<$set name="hidden" value=<<config-title>>>
<$list filter="[<hidden>!text[hide]]" storyview="pop" variable="ignore">

<$transclude tiddler=<<listItem>> mode="inline"/>
</$set>
</$list>
</$set>
</$list>

$:/xp/quickbar/main.title: $:/xp/quickbar/main
$:/xp/quickbar/main.text:
\whitespace trim \define quickbar-inner()
    <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/QuickBar]!has[draft.of]]"> <$list filter="[addprefix[$:/config/xp/quickbar/Items/Visibility/]get[text]] ~show +[match[show]]" variable="ignore">
  • get[show-when]addprefix[tc-quickbar-]] tc-quickbar-item +[join[ ]] }}}> <$list filter="[!is-dropup[yes]]" variable="listItem" emptyMessage=""" <$set name="dropup-state" value=<>> <$set name="dropup-state" value={{{ [addsuffix] }}}> <$button popup=<> selectedClass="tc-selected"> <$set name="tv-wikilinks" value="no"> <$transclude field="caption" mode="inline"/> <$text text=" "/> <$transclude tiddler="$:/core/images/up-arrow" mode="inline"/> """> <$list filter="[has[custom-menu-content]]" variable="listItem" emptyMessage=""" <$link to={{!!target}}> <$set name="tv-wikilinks" value="no"> <$transclude field="caption" mode="inline"/> """> <$transclude field="custom-menu-content" mode="inline"/>
\end <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/QuickBar]!has[draft.of]] +[limit[1]]" variable="listItem">
<>
<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/QuickBar]!has[draft.of]is-dropup[yes]]"> <$list filter="[addprefix[$:/config/xp/quickbar/Items/Visibility/]get[text]] ~show +[match[show]]" variable="ignore"> <$set name="dropup-state" value=<>> <$set name="dropup-state" value={{{ [addsuffix] }}}> <$reveal type="popup" state=<> position={{{ [get[dropup-position]else[below]] }}} class={{{ [get[dropup]get[class]] }}} tag="div">
<$transclude/>

$:/xp/quickbar/readme/en.title: $:/xp/quickbar/readme/en
$:/xp/quickbar/readme/en.text:
QuickBar is a shortcut toolbar at the bottom (only displayed on the large screen), on which you can place frequently used buttons. It is like the [[Menu Bar|$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/menubar]] at the bottom, or more like a Dock bar.

Why build a QuickBar instead of using Menu Bar directly? The main reason is that the Menu Bar occupies the top space. I personally think it would be better to put it at the bottom.

!!! User Guide

* Turn on or hide QuickBar via page control button {{$:/xp/quickbar/button}}.
* Quickly create a new button via {{$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/create}}.
* If the width calculated by QuickBar is not enough, the button will be displayed in two rows. You can adjust the [[width|$:/xp/quickbar/width]] yourself.

!!! Other issues

I may refer to the layout button of [[twpub-tools|https://twpub-tools.org/#%24%3A%2Fcore%2Fui%2FButtons%2Flayout:%24%3A%2Fcore%2Fui%2FButtons%2Flayout%20HelloThere]] and add a new layout that embeds bottom, if time permits.

$:/xp/quickbar/readme/zh.title: $:/xp/quickbar/readme/zh
$:/xp/quickbar/readme/zh.text:
QuickBar 是一个常驻底部的快捷工具栏（仅在大屏显示），您可以在上面放置一些常用按钮。它像是位于底部的 [[Menu Bar|$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/menubar]]，或者更像一个 Dock 栏。

为什么要造一个 QuickBar，而不直接用 Menu Bar？主要是 Menu Bar 占用了顶部空间，个人觉得将其放到底部会好一点。

!! 使用指南

* 通过页面控制按钮 {{$:/xp/quickbar/button}} 开启或隐藏 QuickBar。
* 通过 {{$:/xp/quickbar/Buttons/create}} 快速创建一个新按钮。
* 如果 QuickBar 计算的宽度不够，会导致按钮显示为两行。您可以自己调整 [[width|$:/xp/quickbar/width]]。

!! 其他问题

如果有时间，可能会参考 [[twpub-tools|https://twpub-tools.org/#%24%3A%2Fcore%2Fui%2FButtons%2Flayout:%24%3A%2Fcore%2Fui%2FButtons%2Flayout%20HelloThere]] 的 layout button，添加一种嵌入 bottom 的新布局。

$:/xp/quickbar/readme.title: $:/xp/quickbar/readme
$:/xp/quickbar/readme.text:
<$tiddler tiddler="$:/xp/quickbar/readme/text">
<$radio field="text" value="""{{$:/xp/quickbar/readme/en}}""" > English </$radio> 
<$radio field="text" value="""{{$:/xp/quickbar/readme/zh}}""" > Chinese </$radio>
</$tiddler>

{{$:/xp/quickbar/readme/text}}

$:/xp/quickbar/settings/button-visibilit.title: $:/xp/quickbar/settings/button-visibility
$:/xp/quickbar/settings/button-visibilit.text:
\define quickbar-button-visibility(buttonType)
\define lingo-base() $:/language/TiddlerInfo/
\define config-base() $:/config/xp/quickbar/$buttonType$/Visibility/

<$set name="tv-config-toolbar-icons" value="yes">

<$set name="tv-config-toolbar-text" value="yes">

<$macrocall $name="list-tagged-draggable" tag="$:/tags/QuickBar/$buttonType$" itemTemplate="$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Toolbars/ItemTemplate"/>

</$set>

</$set>
\end

Choose which buttons are displayed on the quickbar. Drag and drop to change the ordering

''Hover popup buttons'':

<<quickbar-button-visibility "HoverPopupButtons">>

''Navigation buttons'':

<<quickbar-button-visibility "NavigationButtons">>

''Page Control Tools'':

<<quickbar-button-visibility "PageControlButtons">>

''Setting buttons'':

<<quickbar-button-visibility "SettingButtons">>

$:/xp/quickbar/settings.title: $:/xp/quickbar/settings
$:/xp/quickbar/settings.text:
\define config-base() $:/config/xp/quickbar/Items/Visibility/

!! Items

Select which items will be shown.

<$set name="tv-config-toolbar-icons" value="yes">

<$set name="tv-config-toolbar-text" value="yes">

<$macrocall $name="list-tagged-draggable" tag="$:/tags/QuickBar" itemTemplate="$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Toolbars/ItemTemplate"/>

</$set>

</$set>

> [[Set the visibility of the buttons|$:/xp/quickbar/settings/button-visibility]]

!! Contents Tag

The tag for the ~TableOfContents used in the Contents

<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/xp/quickbar/TableOfContents/Tag" default="" tag="input"/>

!! ~QuickBar Colours 

To change the colour of the quickbar, define the colours `quickbar-foreground` and `quickbar-background` in the currently selected palette (<<tag $:/tags/Palette>>)

* {{$:/palette}}

$:/xp/quickbar/styles/dropup.title: $:/xp/quickbar/styles/dropup

$:/xp/quickbar/styles.title: $:/xp/quickbar/styles

$:/xp/quickbar/width/hoverpopups.title: $:/xp/quickbar/width/hoverpopups
$:/xp/quickbar/width/hoverpopups.text:
<$list filter="[[$:/config/xp/quickbar/Items/Visibility/$:/xp/quickbar/items/hoverpopups]get[text]else[hide]match[show]]" variable="ignore">
<$set name="buttonsCount" value={{{ [all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$:/tags/QuickBar/HoverPopupButtons]] +[count[]multiply[28]addsuffix[px]] }}}>
<$set name="hidebuttonsCount" value={{{ [all[tiddlers+shadows]prefix[$:/config/xp/quickbar/HoverPopupButtons/Visibility/]get[text]else[show]match[hide]] +[count[]multiply[28]addsuffix[px]] }}}>
<$set name="dividerWidth" value={{{ [[28]subtract[13]addsuffix[px]] }}}>
+ <<buttonsCount>> - <<hidebuttonsCount>> - <<dividerWidth>>
</$set>
</$set>
</$set>
</$list>

$:/xp/quickbar/width/navigation-buttons.title: $:/xp/quickbar/width/navigation-buttons
$:/xp/quickbar/width/navigation-buttons.text:
<$list filter="[[$:/config/xp/quickbar/Items/Visibility/$:/xp/quickbar/items/navigation-buttons]get[text]else[hide]match[show]]" variable="ignore">
<$set name="buttonsCount" value={{{ [all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$:/tags/QuickBar/NavigationButtons]] +[count[]multiply[28]addsuffix[px]] }}}>
<$set name="hidebuttonsCount" value={{{ [all[tiddlers+shadows]prefix[$:/config/xp/quickbar/NavigationButtons/Visibility/]get[text]else[show]match[hide]] +[count[]multiply[28]addsuffix[px]] }}}>
<$set name="dividerWidth" value={{{ [[28]subtract[13]addsuffix[px]] }}}>
+ <<buttonsCount>> - <<hidebuttonsCount>> - <<dividerWidth>>
</$set>
</$set>
</$set>
</$list>

$:/xp/quickbar/width/pagecontrols.title: $:/xp/quickbar/width/pagecontrols
$:/xp/quickbar/width/pagecontrols.text:
<$list filter="[[$:/config/xp/quickbar/Items/Visibility/$:/xp/quickbar/items/pagecontrols]get[text]else[hide]match[show]]" variable="ignore">
<$set name="buttonsCount" value={{{ [all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$:/tags/QuickBar/PageControlButtons]] +[count[]multiply[28]addsuffix[px]] }}}>
<$set name="hidebuttonsCount" value={{{ [all[tiddlers+shadows]prefix[$:/config/xp/quickbar/PageControlButtons/Visibility/]get[text]else[show]match[hide]] +[count[]multiply[28]addsuffix[px]] }}}>
<$set name="dividerWidth" value={{{ [[28]subtract[13]addsuffix[px]] }}}>
<$set name="fontbuttonWidth" value={{{ [[81.5]subtract[28]addsuffix[px]] }}}>
+ <<buttonsCount>> - <<hidebuttonsCount>> - <<dividerWidth>> + <<fontbuttonWidth>>
</$set>
</$set>
</$set>
</$set>
</$list>
